channel.title: [PI] Cannot buy from shops[PI]
channel.description:
Hello moparscape I'm currently working on a PVP server and I've been fixing up everything so it's the way I want it but I cant fix this problem I currently made a new shop just a regular shop that accepts GP heres some info
the shops.cfg
shop = 21 Barrows_Shop 2 2 4732 100000 4734 100000 4736 100000 4738 100000 4708 100000 4710 100000 4712 100000 4714 100000 4716 100000 4718 100000 4720 100000 4722 100000 4745 100000 4747 100000 4749 100000 4751 100000 4724 100000 4726 100000 4728 100000 4730 100000 4753 100000 4755 100000 4757 100000 4759 100000 shop = 22 Ticket_Shop 1 1 3114 100 [ENDOFSHOPLIST]
And lastly in Actionhandler.java
case 4432: c.getShops().openShop(21); break; case 552: c.getShops().openShop(22); break;
that's all the information I put in.
also my prices.txt is not working up for example
http://prntscr.com/1y933b
http://prntscr.com/1y93a9
Please help me solve my issues thanks ,bluedevil666

item.title: [PI] Cannot buy from shops[PI]
item.dc:creator: @bluedevil666 bluedevil666
item.description:
@bluedevil666 wrote:

Hello moparscape
I’m currently working on a PVP server and I’ve been fixing up everything so it’s the way I want it but I cant fix this problem
I currently made a new shop just a regular shop that accepts GP
heres some info

the shops.cfg

shop = 21 Barrows_Shop 2 2 4732 100000 4734 100000 4736 100000 4738 100000 4708 100000 4710 100000 4712 100000 4714 100000 4716 100000 4718 100000 4720 100000 4722 100000 4745 100000 4747 100000 4749 100000 4751 100000 4724 100000 4726 100000 4728 100000 4730 100000 4753 100000 4755 100000 4757 100000 4759 100000
shop = 22 Ticket_Shop 1 1 3114 100
[ENDOFSHOPLIST]

And lastly in Actionhandler.java

	case 4432:
	c.getShops().openShop(21);
	break;
	case 552:
	c.getShops().openShop(22);
	break;

that’s all the information I put in.

also my prices.txt is not working up for example

http://prntscr.com/1y933b

http://prntscr.com/1y93a9

Please help me solve my issues thanks
,bluedevil666
